data.text:
@Lisa54447553 Hej! De flesta flyg är redan på flygschemat, som visar cirka 330 dagar i förväg.
Jag rekommenderar att du kikar på vår webbplats eller använder vårt trafikprogram för att enkelt upptäcka när vi har ett direktflyg tillgängligt för dina flygningar.
@Nuzhat05446658 Hi! you can see that when you have opened your booking on SAS website on: "my bookings", which flights you are checked in on. With king regards, Jonna.

@chuihsia Hi, 

As long as it is a certificate issued by an authorized test facility, the check-in staff will approve it when traveling.

Regards,
Peter

@hedvig_w Hi Hedvig,

We do not have any rules or restrictions on our own regarding testing or documentation. You only need to check and follow the recommendations set by the authorities when you travel.

Regards,
Peter

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
@RFranci82522400 Hi, 

We have not received any information from the Swedish authorities that there is a requirement for passengers to present a Covid certificate for domestic flights.

Regards,
Peter

@Nuzhat05446658 Hi, 

It is the check in personnel at Oslo airport that can check if the baggage is checked in all the way. It depends on if they can access Qatars check in at Arlanda. We can unfortunately not  see in advance if a baggage will be transfered automatically.

Regards,
Peter

@tuke81672733 Hi,

The flights scheduled on the website are flights that we, according to the information we have available at present, will be able to fly.

Regards,
Peter

data.text:
@patriotennr1 Hej Patriotennr1, vi har tyvärr inte support tillgänglig per email eller över PMs på Twitter. Behöver du komma i kontakt med oss så är det Facebook Messenger, vår Chatt eller via Telefonen där vi kan hjälpa dig med ditt ärende.
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

@theghostofkip Hi theghostofkip! We have a limited amount of Youth  tickets available on each flight. If you don't find youth tickets on flights,  it is due to the youth tickets are sold out. If this happens you are able to book adult tickets.
Kind regards, Rebecka

Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

@Forzajuveale8 Hi, 

To help speed up the boarding process and avoid unnecessary movement in the cabin, we are temporary limiting the number of allowed carry-on pieces to 1 bag per traveler.

Regards,
Peter

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@halfgeorgie Hi George,

We can unfortunately very rarely wait for late passengers as it could result in the flight being delayed.

If you would like to file a complaint about it you can do so to our Customer Care department at https://t.co/wprQ9Zejqh

Kind regards,
Philip

@Forzajuveale8 Hi, 

The requirements for tests are decided by each country and it is recommended to check with the respective country's embassy to keep yourself updated on the latest entry regulations. Usually it is 24h before departure of the flight to the actual country.

Regards,
Peter

@STR8CALI_ Hi,

I recommend that you contact us so that we can check your booking. You can contact us by phone or chat on https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

Kind regards,
Philip

@marsden_paula Hi! If you are waiting on a refund you can write to us via our live-chat on SAS webpage or write to us on messenger, We can take a look at your booking there and help you. Kind regards, Jonna.

@OdinRosfjord Hei! Kvalificeringsnivåerna för Silver, Guld och Diamant förblir oförändrade. Du hittar information om förlängningen här: https://t.co/T05QTSSuuB

Med Vänliga Hälsningar, Anja

@DanielaBarhanna Hello Daniela!
You can find all our planned trips here: https://t.co/AGUQlA4HYX

Thank you for contacting us! 
Kind regards, Anja
